title: Screw Bronze Rank
body:
We all know that you simply cannot be banned from this game unless you blatantly cheat, you can pretty much do whatever else you like and Rito can't do shit. And before you say "Oh but you can't get banned", no, you can't: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=taiwan160112

Last game is a premium example of that. First pick gets the jungle role, doesn't take smite, so at the last second I take it with whatever masteries I have, funny that I managed to carry my team from there. Mid is on an abusive rampage with our first pick, and than starts abusing the enemy team and our bot lane. And in the meantime the enemy team sucked balls and allowed me TWICE to simply walk into Mordor and take out their Nexus alone.

I will keep saying it, Rito needs to implement a system that gives and takes LP based on YOUR skill, not that of a fuckknuckle team. Our first pick, been given the JG role and not taking smite, should have lost LP for doing that shit. He had the worst stats behind only both supports and the enemy jungle. If I had not taken smite, we would have most likely lost that game and all because of one person being a dick.

replies.body:
If you're in the hell that is Bronze, you more than likely deserve to be there.

I'd suggest removing that link as you're not allowed to name and shame people.
If you have a problem with the player report them and more on, if you feel that is not enough send a support ticket as a further report.

That is not naming and shaming, it is an account someone created for the sole purpose of being a dick in games to prove you cannot be banned, for anything, ever. Not at least on the OCE server.

And as for being stuck in Bronze and deserving it, no, I just refuse to play as a premade and get easy games. Time and time again I get team mates like I had in that game where our first pick refused to do ANYTHING and almost fucked us over. How, if that shit happens, is is my fault deserving to be stuck in Bronze?

**Remove the link**. Even if it's a troll, you don't name and shame on the boards. Send it in as a support ticket to Riot with what happened in game and they will review it. Pretty obvious its an intent feeder and if you send in a support ticket they will be banned.

>And as for being stuck in Bronze and deserving it, no, I just refuse to play as a premade and get easy games.

Here's your problem. You wont join a premade team (as we all know they are more fun) but you keep saying that randoms in your team are screwing you over. You have two choices. Keep trying to rank up solo style and deal with randoms, or join a team, make friendships and climb together.

It is NOT naming and shaming if you can read.

The guy who made this account PURPOSELY DONE SO to prove you cannot get banned. He is not playing bad because he is bad, he is feeding on PURPOSE. It is a test account to prove something that needs to be proven. Where the fuck is the shaming in that?
> [{quoted}](name=Princess Yaia,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=r3o4WxN7,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-03-22T08:12:08.783+0000)
> Pretty obvious its an intent feeder and if you send in a support ticket they will be banned.
> 

And in case you still can't read, YOU, CANNOT, BE, BANNED! Not on OCE, not ever. The OCE T+C's are set out pretty much stating "We cannot ban you" and this account proves it.

So no, I will not remove the link and no, you or Riot are not even allowed to remove it, again, the T+C's also cover me for that one on the OCE server.

Their last game was 8 days ago, and prior to that they were playing pretty consistently. Safe to say they have been banned. 

It is naming and shaming, even if they player is a purposeful troll. 

If you can't be banned, why are there daily threads complaining about being permabanned?
